item.title: Book of Isaiah II
item.description: I stumbled upon a fantastic, inspirational documentary on Isaiah Thomas and his life as an NBA player so far. Context For those who don't know who Isaiah Thomas is: he is a 5'9 guard who's claim to fame was leading the Boston Celtics to the Eastern Conference Finals in 2016. He put up incredible numbers (29 points and 6 assists on only 33 minutes per game) during his time there and pretty much carried the team.
